group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...

group_1.textRight: Oh, something's bothering you.
Are you tired?

group_1.textLeft: No, it isn't anything like that...
Hey, Yachiyo and Mifuyu...
Do you two remember the first time you tried on@makeup?

group_1.textRight: That's sudden...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@I was just a little curious.

group_1.textRight: ...I don't exactly remember.
I did wear makeup during my modeling jobs...
So, I was probably wearing makeup in elementary@school.
Same as me, it must have been elementary school...
When I was practicing traditional Japanese dance@I was wearing makeup.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...I'd say you two are a bit of a special case...

group_1.textRight: Special you say...
Well, I think it'd typically be around high school?

group_1.textLeft: Right, that's right!
It's too early for elementary students to have@makeup...!

group_1.textRight: What exactly happened...

group_1.textLeft: My little sister is in elementary school and asked@me to put makeup on her...
I was thinking it must be too early for her, but...
...she was really insistent, so I only put on a little.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Isn't that just heartwarming?

group_1.textLeft: But but,@that girl only goes to places...
...like parks and candy stores, though?
What would she want makeup for...

group_1.textRight: She's getting to the age where she wants to be a@little more grown up, I'm sure.

group_1.textLeft: Candy store...trying to be grown up...
*Chuckle*
That's right, Mifuyu was like that.

group_1.textRight: Huh, wh-what do you mean...?

group_1.textLeft: You don't remember?
When we were little we went to the candy store@together.

group_1.textRight: Ahh, we went together, I do remember that!
That was an important memory to me.

group_1.textLeft: Mifuyu was going to a candy store...
That's a little surprising.@You were a proper young lady, weren't you?

group_1.textRight: Yes, my family was always quite strict, so they'd@never permit me to go to the candy store.
That's why I secretly went with Yachan.
I never got to buy many toys or sweets...
...so I remember it was quite exciting.

group_1.textLeft: Mifuyu was practically jumping for joy.
You'd buy toy accessories and candy rings...
"What do you think?! Do I look like an adult now?!"
...like that...

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
I, I said something like that...?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, you did.@It left such an impression that I still remember it.

group_1.textRight: Ugh... I know I was still a child back then,@but it's a little embarrassing to hear...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Isn't that nice.
That's "around the age you want to be more grown@up," right?

group_1.textRight: ...That is true.
Everyone is like that at one point, right?
